name: Pringles Beard
description: It's said to be the symbol of mature men and gentlemen.

name: Pringles Chest
description: Pringles' special loot box for RO players, with delicious crisps and some mysterious gifts. What you find depends on your luck.

name: Pringles Voucher
description: The gift vouchers from the Pringles Chest can be used to redeem exclusive headwear and emoji from the Pringles Beard Mall.

name: Promise Crown
description: The full moon is shining above the sakura tree and the perfect gem refracts a unique brilliance. People with a heart full of expectations have finally arrived as promised. Put on the crown and seal the deal under the moonlight.

name: Prontera Chest
description: Open the box, you will certainly receive some Colorful Shell, with a probability to receive Raccoon Leaf, Four-leaf Clover, Antenna, Soft Feather, Light Granule, Iron, Mandragora, Pet EXP Potion (S), Pet EXP Potion (M), Pet EXP Potion (L), etc.

name: Prontera Lance
description: The spears used by the guards of Prontera are powerful.

name: Prontera Lance [2]
description: The spears used by the guards of Prontera are powerful.

name: Prontera's Guard
description: "I really hate it here!" Kelly said with anger. "It is too noisy here, every day, people wearing all kinds of exotic clothes pretend to help you hook up!", "…Unexpectedly, this month's expedition funds have gone to buy a pile of useless hats! Every day they seduce me! Every day they seduce me!", "Ugh! I really hate it here." Kelly said with an angry expression, laughing with tears in her eyes. She turned her head, and at this time, a breeze blew through the center of the Capital Square and her beautiful brown hair thrown into the sky. Well, this kid really likes it here!
